1616520.name: リトルハーツ
1616520.description:
LittleHearts is a turn-based strategy simulation game set in a fantasy world of swords and sorcery. The game is played by carefully and thoughtfully manipulating characters on the map to defeat enemies, and completing the Conditions of Victory set for each chapter will advance you to the next chapter.

The protagonist of the story and his team of 17 characters each have their own weapons, skills that they acquire as they grow, and a variety of personalities depending on the direction they choose in the 'Class Change' option, which gives them a significant boost in power. Make use of their abilities, defeat enemies and advance the story.

Story

.
This is a world of swords and magic, where three nations rule the earth.
People lived while fighting demons that appeared from somewhere and attacked people.

One day, a revolutionary army rose up in the Lieav Empire in the snowfields of the southwest.
The revolution is accomplished at breakneck speed.
A new emperor ruled the land.

The remaining two countries, the Kingdom of Feal and the Principality of Lots, held a tripartite meeting to find out the intentions of the new emperor.
The people of the Empire were in a state of poverty and the new emperor wanted assistance to save his people.
Neither the Kingdom nor the Principality was negative about the aid itself, but the scale of the aid demanded by the new Empire was so great that the three countries could not come to terms with each other.

The Empire, in desperation, declared war against the Kingdom.
It was expected that this would be too reckless in a situation where they were seeking support, but in a very short time the newborn Empire fell the capital of the kingdom.

The story begins when Alma, the princess of the kingdom, meets Klaus, a young man from a mercenary squad. ......

Game Features

  • Nimble 2D dot combat animation.
  • Simple and enjoyable system and balance for beginners, but a tough SRPG in hard mode.
  • The story and drama of those who fight for their beliefs, rather than for good or evil.
  • After clearing the game, an extra mode is provided that eliminates the element of luck and allows the player to conquer each stage of the main story.

About posting and monetising play videos

.As of 22 December 2023, you may post videos of the game Little Hearts in accordance with the following guidelines.

The main purpose of the video must not be to extract in-game media, such as playing background music only.
The video must not aim to damage the image of the content.
The URL of the store page must be indicated on the page where the video is posted.
If the producer requests the deletion of the video, the video must be promptly complied with.
When monetising the video, the video contributor must add his/her own creativity by adding live sound, comments, etc.
